const[liveFeed,setLiveFeed]=useState(null);const[feedLoading,setFeedLoading]=useState(false);const[feedLastUpdate,setFeedLastUpdate]=useState(null);const[feedError,setFeedError]=useState(false);const[feedCountdown,setFeedCountdown]=useState(300);// seconds until next refresh

if(liveFeed!==null&&liveFeed!==void 0&&liveFeed.feed){const oldTitles=new Set(liveFeed.feed.map(i=>i.title));const newIds=new Set(data.feed.map((item,i)=>oldTitles.has(item.title)?null:i).filter(i=>i!==null));setNewItemIds(newIds);setTimeout(()=>setNewItemIds(new Set()),4000);}setLiveFeed(data);setFeedLastUpdate(new Date());setFeedCountdown(300);}}catch(_unused){setFeedError(true);}finally{setFeedLoading(false);}};const setPage=p=>{setPageRaw(p);};const handleLogin=()=>setAuthScreen(null);const handleLogout=()=>{clearAuth();setAuthScreen('login');};const t=T[lang];const isAr=lang==='ar';const dir=isAr?'rtl':'ltr';const font=isAr?"'Cairo','Segoe UI',sans-serif":"'DM Sans',-apple-system,sans-serif";const showToast=function(msg){let color=arguments.length>1&&arguments[1]!==undefined?arguments[1]:'#22c55e';setToast({msg,color});setTimeout(()=>setToast(null),3500);};const openPreview=(reportId,title,type)=>{setPreviewModal({reportId,title,type});};const loadData=async()=>{try{const[rRes,sRes]=await Promise.all([getReports(),getStats()]);setReports(rRes.data);setStats(sRes.data);}catch(e){console.error(e);}finally{setLoading(false);}};useEffect(()=>{loadData();},[]);// Auto-fetch and refresh intelligence feed
